result.execSummary:
The defendant Anthony C. MARTINEZ was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case. One or more other charges in this case were dismissed. The dismissed charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Anthony C. MARTINEZ is presumed innocent of the dismissed charges.

  • Anthony C. MARTINEZ was found guilty of Retail Theft - Intentionally Take (<=$500) [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.50(1m)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Concurrent with the prison sentence imposed on 14 CF 328.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Anthony C. MARTINEZ

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Transcript of sentencing hearing held on 01-14-15.
Original transcript is on file in case no: 14 CF 328.

Defendant in custody.
NO CONTEST plea entered to count 2, worthless check.  Convicted.
The defendant is sentenced to nine (9) months incarceration, concurrent with the sentence imposed on 14 CF 328.
Court costs are waived.
Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights.
Notice of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief.
Minutes.
Plea hearing is set for 01-14-15 at 8:30 a.m.
Defendant's Notice of Motion; Defendant's Demand and Motion for Discovery and Inspection.

Defendant in custody.  
State moves to dismiss count 1, bail jumping.  Motion granted.  
Not guilty plea to count 2, PTC Retail Theft.  Jury Calendar.  Settlement conference with the District Attorney is set for 11-18-14 at 1:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $500.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Shopko.  Bail furnished.  
Minutes.

RE:  Bail jumping, on 07-29-14.
Initial appearance is set for 10-27-14 at 2:30 p.m.
